text: Aey payghumbar! Jab musalman aurten aap say inn baaton per bait kerney aayen kay woh Allah kay sath kissi ko shareek na keren gi chori na keren gi zina kaari na keren gi apni aulad ko naa maar dalen gi aur koi aisa bohtaan na bandhay gi jo khud apney haathon pairon kay sath gharr len aur kissi nek kaam mein teri bey hukmi na keren gi to aap inn say bait ker liya keren aur inn kay liye Allah say maghfirat talab keren be-shak Allah bakshney aur moaf kerney wala hai
